title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - CFB Week 1 Reaction with Fox Lead Analyst Joel Klatt
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - CFB Week 1 Reaction with Fox Lead Analyst Joel Klatt
description:
Fox CFB Analyst Joel Klatt and Colin react to all the big games this weekend. They discuss Alabama's continued dominance, the inside story of how Chip Kelly rebuilt the program at UCLA, why the transfer portal has been so effective, how Wisconsin could've beaten Penn State, if Iowa is still the "Fake ID of College Football", why Clemson shouldn't feel so bad about losing to Georgia, why Joel has what Colin considers a "gem" of a theory about Notre Dame and Stanford, what USC's win exposed about the program, why the targeting penalties are out of control, and the most emotional moment of the weekend.

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
